Compressor Time Management
Action {{ option.label }}
Warning: This will reset ALL compressor data to zero and restart timing.
This action cannot be undone.
Hours Cannot be negative Max 8760 hours h
Minutes Cannot be negative Max 59 minutes m
Seconds Cannot be negative Max 59 seconds s
Note: This adds buffer time to the display without affecting real-time calculations.
